Name: BfsMedstats17Admitsource
Title: BFS Medizinische Statistik - 17 1.2.V02 - Aufenthaltsort vor dem Eintritt / Séjour avant l’admission / Luogo di soggiorno prima dell’ammissione
Description: BFS defines variables for medical statistic (german, french, italian) see [BFS](https://www.bfs.admin.ch/bfs/de/home/statistiken/kataloge-datenbanken/publikationen.assetdetail.7066232.html). Unmittelbarer Aufenthaltsort vor dem Eintritt. Wo befand sich BFS der Patient / die Patientin?

Name: BfsMedstats18Admittype
Title: BFS Medizinische Statistik - 18 1.2.V03 - Eintrittsart / Mode d’admission / Genere di ricovero
Description: BFS defines variables for medical statistic (german, french, italian) see [BFS](https://www.bfs.admin.ch/bfs/de/home/statistiken/kataloge-datenbanken/publikationen.assetdetail.7066232.html). Beschreibung der Umstände des Eintritts. Wie wurde der BFS Patient / die Patientin aufgenommen?

Name: BfsMedstats29Dischargeencounter
Title: BFS Medizinische Statistik - 29 1.5.V04 - Behandlung nach Austritt / Prise en charge après la sortie / Trattamento dopo l’uscita
Description: BFS defines variables for medical statistic (german, french, italian) see [BFS](https://www.bfs.admin.ch/bfs/de/home/statistiken/kataloge-datenbanken/publikationen.assetdetail.7066232.html). Behandlung, Pflege, Rehabilitation nach dem Spitalaufenthalt. Es geht darum, den Behandlungserfolg resp. den Abhängigkeitsgrad bei Austritt anzugeben. Nur die am besten zutreffende Kategorie auswählen.

Name: ChCoreEncounterParticipationType
Title: ChCoreEncounterParticipationType
Description: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate how an individual participates in an encounter. In Switzerland the primary care physician is added to the extensible base ValueSet.

Name: DesignationsVS
Title: CH IG Designations
Description: Example value set including all codes from the designations code system.

Name: SctVS
Title: CH IG SNOMED CT
Description: Example value set including SNOMED CT codes from the international and the Swiss edition.

Name: AdministrativeGender
Title: AdministrativeGender
Description: The gender of a person used for administrative purposes.

Name: ContactPointSystem
Title: ContactPointSystem
Description: Telecommunications form for contact point.

Name: ContactPointUse
Title: ContactPointUse
Description: Use of contact point.

Name: DiagnosisRole
Title: DiagnosisRole
Description: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to express the role of a diagnosis on the Encounter or EpisodeOfCare record.

Name: Diet
Title: Diet
Description: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate dietary preferences or restrictions a patient may have.

Name: EncounterLocationStatus
Title: EncounterLocationStatus
Description: The status of the location.

Name: EncounterReasonCodes
Title: Encounter Reason Codes
Description: This examples value set defines the set of codes that can be used to indicate reasons for an encounter.

Name: SpecialArrangements
Title: Special arrangements
Description: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the kinds of special arrangements in place for a patients visit.

Name: SpecialCourtesy
Title: Special courtesy
Description: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate special courtesies provided to the patient.

Name: EncounterStatus
Title: EncounterStatus
Description: Current state of the encounter.

Name: EncounterType
Title: Encounter type
Description: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the type of encounter: a specific code indicating type of service provided.

Name: Identifier Type Codes
Title: IdentifierType
Description: A coded type for an identifier that can be used to determine which identifier to use for a specific purpose.

Name: IdentifierUse
Title: IdentifierUse
Description: Identifies the purpose for this identifier, if known .

Name: CommonLanguages
Title: Common Languages
Description: This value set includes common codes from BCP-47 (http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

Name: LocationType
Title: Location type
Description: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the physical form of the Location.

Name: ServiceType
Title: Service type
Description: This value set defines an example set of codes of service-types.

Name: Hl7VSReAdmissionIndicator
Title: hl7VS-re-admissionIndicator
Description: Value Set of codes which are used to specify that a patient is being re-admitted to a healthcare facility from which they were discharged, and indicates the circumstances around such re-admission.

Name: v2.0360.2.7
Title: v2 table 0360
Description: Version 2.7
Uses: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0360 ver 2.9 ( Degree/License/Certificate)

Name: ActEncounterCode
Title: ActEncounterCode
Description: Domain provides codes that qualify the ActEncounterClass (ENC)
